data.name: DJMAX RESPECT V - CLEAR PASS : S6 CLEAR POINT BOOSTER
data.detailed_description:
Buy this product to complete Clear Pass easier with below effects:
- Clear Point Boost : Clear Point earned by play is boosted, let users get Clear Pass Rewards faster.
- STEP 30 Guarantee : At the end of Season 6, Clear Step automatically reach STEP 30, and player can earn rewards at the grace period.

※This product will only make the purchased user be Step 30 at the end of the Season. The purchased user must receive rewards in-game while the reward-receiving period after the end of the season.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GTX 460 or AMD HD 5850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
